entity.name: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
entity.description: A dedicated group of forensic investigators at the Las Vegas Crime Lab work to solve often-grisly crimes in Sin City. Heading up the graveyard shift (an appropriate term in this case) is supervisor D.B. Russell, who is a `Left Coast' Sherlock Holmes who devours crime novels. The members of Russell's team include Catherine Willows, Nick Stokes, Sara Sidle (the team's moral compass), Greg Sanders and Morgan Brody. The team works closely with Capt Jim Brass, a seasoned detective who is a protector of CSI - sometimes to a fault. Previous heads of the group include Gus Grissom and Dr Raymond Langston.

urls.title: Environment Agency drops pollution incident reporting
urls.description: The Environment Agency (EA) has changed the way it reports its corporate performance, dropping a goal of reducing pollution incidents while introducing climate adaptation and air quality targets.

You get a compliance classification score. Depending on how many points you get defines your Site banding and the cost of your subsistence.
